
```{r}
circ_data <- data.frame(circularity)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
circ_plot <- ggplot(circ_data, aes(x = Bud_status, y = Circularity)) + geom_violin(fill = "Blue") + ggtitle("Circularity for budded vs unbudded cells")
```

```{r}
circ_plot
```
